maqras.text: k’uranyawi (seyit’ani) «getachini hoyi! ine alasasatikutimi፡፡ gini (rasu) beruk’i sihiteti wisit’i neberi» yilali፡፡
(alahi) «wede’inanite zachani be’irigit’i yasik’edemiku sihoni ine zenidi atich’ek’ach’ek’u» yilachewali፡፡
«k’alu ine zenidi ayilewet’imi፡፡ inemi lebaroche fets’imo bedayi ayidelehumi» (yilachewali)፡፡
legehanemi «molashini? yeminilibetinina ch’imari aleni? yemitilibetini k’eni» (asit’enik’ik’achewi)፡፡
genetimi alahini leferuti iruk’i balihone sifira tik’ik’erebalechi፡፡
«yihi wede alahi temelashina (higigatuni) t’ebak’i lehone hulu yetek’et’erachihuti newi» (yibalalu)፡፡
«alirehimanini beruk’u hono leferana benits’uhi libi lemet’a» (tik’ik’erebalechi)፡፡
«beselami gibwati yihi yemezewiteriya k’eni newi» (yibalalu)፡፡
lenerisu bewisit’wa sihonu yemishuti hulu alilachewi፡፡ inyami zenidi ch’imari alile፡፡

ke’inerisumi (kek’ureyishochi) befiti kekifile zemenati hizibochi bizuwochini inerisu behayalineti ke’inerisu yibelit’i yeberetu yehonutini (mamilech’a filega) beye’agerochumi yemeremerutini at’ifitenali፡፡ mamilech’a aleni
bezihi wiset’i le’irisu libi lalewi weyimi irisu (belibu) yetet’ade hono (wedeminebebileti) jorowini let’ale sewi gisats’e alebeti፡፡
semayatinina midirini bemekakelachewi yalewinimi hulu besidisiti k’enati wisit’i be’irigit’i fet’erini፡፡ dikamimi minimi alinekanimi፡፡
bemilutimi layi tagesi፤ getahinimi kemamesigeni gari ts’ehayi kemewit’atwa befiti kemegibatwami befiti awedisewi፡፡
kelelitumi awedisewi kesigidetochimi behwalawochi (awedisewi)፡፡
(yeminegerihini) adamit’imi፡፡ t’eriwi kek’iribi sifira bemit’erabeti k’eni (kemek’abirachewi yiwet’alu)፡፡
ch’uhetituni be’iwineti yemisemubeti k’eni ya (kemek’abiri) yemewich’awi k’eni newi፡፡
inya inyawi hiyawi inaderigaleni፡፡ inigedilalenimi፡፡ memeleshami wede’inya bicha newi፡፡
yemifet’inu honewi midiri ke’inerisu layi yemitisenet’at’ek’ibeti k’eni (yemewich’awi k’eni newi)፡፡ yihi be’inya layi geri yehone mesebisebi newi፡፡
inya yemilutini hulu ‘awak’i neni፡፡ anitemi be’inerisu layi asigedaji ayidelehimi፡፡ silezihi zachayeni yemiferani sewi bek’uri’ani asitawisi፡፡
mebetenini betanyochi behonuti (nefasochi)፡፡
kebadi (zinamini) teshekamiwochi behonutimi (demenawochi)፡፡
geri (menishalelini) tenishalayochi behonutimi (merikebochi)፡፡
negerini hulu akefafayochi behonutimi (mela’ikiti) imilalehu፡፡
yemitik’et’eruti (tinisa’e) iwineti newi፡፡
(inideyesirawi) wagani maginyetimi፤ hwanyi newi፤ (yemayik’eri newi)፡፡
ye(kewakibiti) menigedochi balebeti behonechiwi semayi imilalehu፡፡
inanite (yemeka sewochi) beteleyaye k’ali wisit’i nachihu፡፡
kerisu yemizizori sewi yizizorali፡፡
begimiti yeminageru wishetamochi teregemu፡፡
ineziya inerisu bemishefini sihitete wisit’i zenigiwochi yehonuti፡፡
yewaga mesich’awi k’eni meche inide hone yit’eyik’alu፡፡
(inerisu) be’isati layi bemifetenubeti k’eni newi፡፡
«mekerachihuni k’imesu፤ yihi ya be’irisu tichakolubeti yeneberachihuti newi» (yibalalu)፡፡
alahini feriwochu be’atikilitochina beminich’ochi wisit’i nachewi፡፡
yanini getachewi yeset’achewini tek’ebayochi honewi፤ (begeneti wisit’i yihonalu)፡፡ inerisu kezihi befiti melikami seriwochi neberuna፡፡
kelelitu t’ik’itini bicha yitenyu neberu፡፡
belelitu mech’ereshawochimi inerisu mihiretini yileminalu፡፡
begenizebochachewimi wisit’i lelemanyina (kelimena) letekelekelemi (bechirotachewi) mebiti alile፡፡
bemidirimi wisit’i lemiyaregagit’u sewochi milikitochi alilu፡፡
benefisochachihumi wisit’i (milikitochi alilu)፤ tadiya atimeleketumini?›
sisayachihumi yemitik’et’erutimi (fidana minida) besemayi wisit’i newi፡፡
besemayina bemidiri getami imilalehu፡፡ irisu inanite inidemitinageruti bit’e irigit’enya newi፡፡
yetekeberuti ye’ibirahimi inigidochi were met’itohalini
be’irisu layi begebuna «selemi» balu gize (asitawisi)፡፡ «selami yalitawek’achihu hizibochi nachihu፤» alachewi፡፡
wede betesebumi tezenebele፤» wediyawimi yeseba weyifenini amet’a፡፡
wede’inerisumi (aridona t’ebiso) ak’erebewi፡፡ «atibelumi weyi?» alachewi፡፡
ke’inerisu mefiratinimi belibu asadere፡፡ «atifira» aluti፡፡ be‘awak’i wet’ati lijimi abeseruti፡፡
misitumi iyech’ohechi met’achi፡፡ fitwanimi metachi፡፡ «mekani arogiti nenyi» alechimi፡፡
inidezihi getashi bilwali፡፡ «ineho irisu t’ibeba ‘awak’i newina» alwati፡፡
